## General Info

-   Technology which allows logical separation of routing tables on single device.
-   Routes learned from main routing table aren't learned by vrf tables
-   `VRF` when used with MPLS, `VRF-Lite` when used without
-   

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Useful show commands + other

-   `show ip vrf` / `show vrf` - shows summary of configured VRFs, including interfaces.

-   `show ip route vrf [vrf-name]` - shows routing table of VRF

-   `show ip vrf interfaces` / `show vrf ipv4 unicast interfaces` - shows interfaces in VRF.

-   `ping vrf [name] 10.1.1.1` - ping from specific VRF

-    `show ip eigrp vrf [vrf-name] interfaces`

-   

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Config

``` default
vrf definition TENANT-A
  address-family ipv4
!
interface g0/0
  vrf forwarding TENANT-A
  ip address 192.0.2.1 255.255.255.0
!
```
